reviews.review_msg: Such an easy course!! GPA booster for sure!!!

I don't EVER write reviews. Not in my 5 years of undergrad but let me tell you how amazing he is. He is not only so sweet and considerate (with a voice that that is so smooth and nice to hear) his lectures are so interesting and he is so understanding. His humour is so dorky and cheesy and I think we all need that in our lives. Definite A.

He looks like Justin Trudeau. Anyway, great class. Now i have further appreciation for films. Course material is quite interesting. 2 papers: one very short and one adequate in length.  STUDY GUIDE PROVIDED FOR EXAMS, but you may see few questions not mentioned on the guide. Tests is on the easier side with lenient marking. def worth,would do again
You will love him gradually, especially share ideas with him, that will be so good.

Really nice and funny but I can't recommend this professor if you are seriously into films. It takes forever for him to respond any emails and he is pretty unorganized with his material. He says we'll have quiz today and then postpones because no time after movie. His assignment outline was outdated from last year. The course is pretty easy though.
